body_html: @znmeb I'm doubtful it found GPU device in your case because in mine it printed debug info in the beginning about selecting GPU device. Perhaps you can recompile with added printf to console somewhere in tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc.
body_text: @znmeb I'm doubtful it found GPU device in your case because in mine it printed debug info in the beginning about selecting GPU device. Perhaps you can recompile with added printf to console somewhere in tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc.
body: @znmeb I'm doubtful it found GPU device in your case because in mine it printed debug info in the beginning about selecting GPU device. Perhaps you can recompile with added `printf` to console somewhere in `tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc`.
